name: fist
effect: On Hit: Do 1 damage. Bonus: If you hit, move the target 2 tiles in any direction.

name: ball bat
effect: Double your Throw Range while wielding this weapon. On Hit: Do 4 damage. Bonus: If you hit, give the target Slow until the start of your next turn.
upgrades: Spiked - Bonus: If you hit, the target takes 1 damage every dice they spend on their next turn.
Metal Core - +1 Damage

name: club
effect: On Hit: Do 2 damage. Bonus: If you hit, give the target 1 Stun.
upgrades: Batton - Bonus: +1 Stun.
Torch - On Hit: Give the target 2 Burn. Bonus: +1 Burn

name: dagger
effect: On Hit: Do 2 damage. Bonus: Gain +1d4 damage.
upgrades: Silent - This weapon has +2 damage while you are Hidden.
Throwing - Double the Throw Range of this weapon.

name: hand crossbow
effect: On Hit: Do 1 damage. Bonus: Gain +2 damage. Downside: Do not Autoload at the end of your turn.
upgrades: Repeater - +2 Ammo (Loading 3)

name: great hammer
effect: This Weapon does double damage against objects and structures. On Hit: Do 4 damage. Bonus: If you hit, you may do 4 Knockback. Downside: You gain Slow until the start of your next turn.
upgrades: Proven - Bonus: Do +2 damage instead of Knockback.
Delayed - Knockback accumulates from this weapon and happens at the end of your Turn.

name: lance
effect: If you move 3 or more tiles before attacking, gain the Weapon Bonus. On Hit: Do 2 damage. Bonus: Do additional damage equal to half (rounded up) of how far you moved.

name: mace
effect: This Weapon does 2 extra damage to Prone targets. On Hit: Do 2 damage. Bonus: If the target is Rooted they become Prone.
upgrades: Knockdown - Bonus: If the target is Stunned they become Prone.
Glowy - This weapon gains Glow. (Can be used to cast spells)

name: whip
effect: On Hit: Do 2 damage. Bonus: Gain +2 Reaching.
upgrades: Spiked - +1 Damage
Ribbon - Bonus: Do a Grapple contest against the target.

name: brass knuckles
effect: On Hit: Do 1+BODY damage. Bonus: If you or the target are Grappled, gain +2 damage.
upgrades: Spiked - +1 Damage

name: sword
effect: On Hit: Do 3 damage. Bonus: Gain +2 damage.
upgrades: Short - This weapon gains Side (counts as a Side Weapon)
Sharpened - +1 Damage

name: hand axe
effect: On Hit: Do 2 damage. Bonus: If you hit, remove 3 Shielding then do On Hit. Downside: -1 Damage.

name: spear
effect: If this weapon is Two Handed gain +2 damage and +2 Reaching. On Hit: Do 2 damage. Bonus: Do a Weapon Attack against all targets in a 2 tile line. Downside: No Reaching.
upgrades: Pike - +2 Reaching, Downside becomes: -2 Reaching.

name: greatsword
effect: On Hit: Do 4 damage. Bonus: Gain +2 damage. Downside: -2 damage.

name: greataxe
effect: On Hit: Do 4 damage. Bonus: If you hit, remove 5 Shielding then do On Hit. Downside: -2 damage.
upgrades: Halberd - This weapon gains 2 Reaching but has -1 damage.

name: crossbow
effect: On Hit: Do 3 damage. Bonus: If you hit, remove 3 Shielding then do On Hit. Downside: Do not Autoload at the end of your turn.
upgrades: Balista - +2 Damage,-1 Speed while carried
tags: weapon, two-handed, range 12, loading 1, autoload, body 1

name: hand wraps
effect: On Hit: Do 1+MIND damage. Bonus: If you hit, move the target 4 tiles in any direction.
upgrades: Boxer - Do 1+BODY damage instead of 1+MIND
Rough - Bonus: If the target is Marked you may make them go Prone.

name: rapier
effect: On Hit: Do 2 damage. Bonus: You may move 3 tiles before or after the Attack.
upgrades: Light - Bonus: +1 tile to move
Gilded - Damage becomes CHARM-1

name: stiletto dagger
effect: On Hit: Do 1 damage. Bonus: If you hit, the target spends 1 Strain.
upgrades: Pin - This weapon has +1d4 damage while you are Hidden.

name: long bow
effect: On Hit: Do 3 damage. Bonus: Gain +2 damage. Downside: -2 Damage.
upgrades: Arching - Targets do not gain the Hunker Down bonus to Dodge.
Stiff - +2 damage, -8 Range

name: short bow
effect: On Hit: Do 2 damage. Bonus: If you hit, give the target Slow until the start of your next turn.
upgrades: Composite - +1 damage, +3 range
Seriated Arrows - On Hit: Do 1 damage at the start of the hit target's next turn. (This effect stacks.)

name: popshard revolver
effect: On Hit: Do 1 damage. Bonus: If you hit, you may spend 1 Strain then gain +1 damage and roll a d6. If the roll was less than or equal to the ammo left, spend 1 ammo, gain +1 damage, and roll again. Downside: -1 ammo.
upgrades: Heavyshard- +2 damage,-3 Ammo (Loading 3)
Quickload - This weapon gains Autoload.

name: popshard rifle
effect: This weapon has +8 Range while you are Prone. On Hit: Do 3 damage. Bonus: If you hit, remove 3 Shielding then do On Hit. Downside: -1 Ammo.
upgrades: Longnose - +8 Range, while Prone gain +16 Range instead of +8
Heavyshard - +3 damage,-3 Ammo (Loading 1)
Bayonet - This weapon can be used for Melee Attacks.

name: popshard shotgun
effect: This weapon Attacks targets 1 tile to the left and right of the main target. On Hit: do 2 damage. Bonus: This weapon Attacks all targets within 1 tile of the main target.
upgrades: Quickload - This weapon gains Autoload.
Sawed Off - This weapon hits 2 tiles to the left and right but has -2 Range
Bayonet - This weapon can be used for Melee Attacks.

name: mage gauntlets
effect: On Hit: Do 1+SOUL damage. Bonus: If you hit, you may do 2 Knockback and may move 1 tile.

name: yoyo
effect: On Hit: Do 1 damage. Bonus: Refund 1 Strain. Downside: No Reaching.
upgrades: Longer String - +2 Reaching, Downside becomes: -2 Reaching.

name: paladin hammer
effect: On Hit: Do 2 damage and if you are Blessed become Empowered until the end of your turn. Bonus: Spend 1 Strain then choose: +3 damage, if you hit do 5 Knockback, or heal your MEDICINE.

name: crystal lanturn
effect: On Hit: Give 2 Burn. Bonus: If you hit, give 3 Burn instead.
upgrades: Residual Sparks - On Hit: Give the target Glow until the start of your next turn.

name: crystal staff
effect: On Hit: Do 3 damage. Bonus: If you hit, give the target 1 Stun. Downside: No Reaching.

name: soul tome
effect: Gain +1 Max Strain. You can only hold 1 at a time. On Hit: Do 1 damage. Bonus: Gain +1 damage.
upgrades: Heavy Tome - Gain +2 Max Strain (3 in total),-1 Speed while carried.
Painful Pages - +1 damage.

name: naturalist's shillelagh
effect: On Hit: Do 2 damage. Bonus: If you hit, choose:  give 1 Burn, Wet until the end of their next turn, or do 1 damage to a new target within 1 tile of the main target.

name: clothing
effect: While worn gives +1 Speed and Dodge.
upgrades: Soul Weave - Gain 1 Ward at the end of a Rest.
Flowing - When Slowed (or on Death's Door 1) gain +1 Speed after halving Speed.

name: light leather
effect: At the end of a Rest gain your LEVEL Shielding. While worn gives +1 Dodge.
upgrades: Custom Made - Choose a Sub-Stat. Gain +SUB-STAT Shielding.

name: medium chainmail
effect: At the end of a Rest gain 2xBODY + 2xMIND + LEVEL Shielding. While worn gives -1 Speed.
upgrades: Quick Release - When you have no Shielding gain +1 Speed.

name: heavy plate
effect: At the end of a Rest gain 4xBODY + 3xMIND + LEVEL Shielding. While worn gives -1 Speed and Dodge.
upgrades: Paladin - 4xBODY + 2xSOUL + LEVEL Shielding on Rest instead of default.

name: shield
effect: Uses 1 hand. At the end of a Rest gain your LEVEL Shielding. While held when you Hunker Down you act as having Half Cover from Ranged Attacks.
upgrades: Tower - +LEVEL Shielding
Warded - Gain 1 Ward at the end of a Rest.

name: bandage
effect: Spend # and the Bandage; Heal a creature within 1 tile of you 1+MEDICINE.

name: frag grenade
effect:
Spend ##; Throw the grenade to a point up to 6 tiles away. Do a Thrown Attack against everything within 2 tiles of that point. 
On Hit: Do 4 damage.
Bonus: Gain +2 damage.

name: flash grenade
effect: Spend ##; Throw the grenade to a point up to 6 tiles away. Everything within 2 tiles of that point is Blinded until the end of their turn. If a target is already Blinded they gain 3 Stun.

name: smoke grenade
effect: Spend ##; Throw the grenade to a point up to 6 tiles away. Everything within 2 tiles of that point is Obscured for 1 minute.

name: totem
effect: Spend ##; Activate or throw the totem to a point up to 6 tiles away. When activated, copy any Aura you currently have active. While you have an Aura the totem's Aura remains active.

name: grapple rope
effect: Spend #; Attach or throw the grapple up to 6 tiles away. Once attached creatures may climb the rope without rolling Body.

name: throwing knife set
effect:
Spend ##; Throw Attack a target up to 6 tiles away.
On Hit: Do 1 damage.
Bonus: Gain +2 damage.

name: bandolier
effect: Once per Break or Rest you may fully reload a weapon with Loading without spending dice. You may also equip a Side weapon without spending a dice.

name: spyglass
description: A brass folding spyglass with opaque blue glass.
effect: This spyglass can be used to see anything up to the horizon clearly.

name: upgrade kit
description: A set of small flimsy tools and parts.
effect: At the end of a Rest a creature may spend the Kit to give an item any Upgrade it may have. (You cannot give an item the same Upgrade twice.)

name: medkit
effect: Spend # and 1 Strain; Heal a creature within 1 tile of you MEDICINE.

name: trapper's tools
effect:
Spend ## and 2 Strain then pick Tripwire, Snare, or Popmine: Place a Trap within 1 tile of you. Creatures may spend # to do a Senses roll against you to detect Traps. Traps last until you deactivate them or they are triggered.
- *Tripwire* - Trap an area up to 1x3 tiles. Targets that move into this area go Prone, and may trigger attached Items.
- *Snare* - Trap an area up to 2x2 tiles. This must be attached to a ceiling. Targets that move into this area are Grappled and go up to 4 tiles into the air. The snare has 1 Health and +3 Dodge against targets it Grapples.
- *Popmine* - Trap a tile. Targets that move into the tile are moved up to 4 tiles in a direction. Direction chosen on placement. (This movement counts as Knockback and can take Knockback damage.)

name: thieves' tools
effect: You can use Thieving to unlock entryways or items, and can use Crafting or Thieving to disarm Traps.

name: alchemy tools
effect: You can use Medicine or Arcana to identify liquids. Spend ### and 3 Strain; Create a non-Magical Alchemy item which lasts until the end of your next Rest.

name: tunneler's tools
effect: Contains a lightsource and tools needed to spend 1 minute tunneling through 1 tile square of loose earth or stone. If you spend 1 minute and 2 strain you may tunnel through 1 tile square of solid stone.

name: tinker's tools
effect: Spend # and 2-CRAFTING Strain (min 0); Make any non-magical non-alchemical common or uncommon item. It lasts 1 minute then breaks.

name: antidote
effect: Spend # and the potion; You cannot gain effects from poisons for 1 minute, and remove any current effects from poisons when consumed.

name: alchemists fire
effect:
Spend ##; Throw the potion to a point up to 6 tiles away. The potion shatters on impact. Do an Item Attack against everything within 2 tiles of that point. Ground tiles ignite until the start of your next turn. Creatures which start their turn in this tile or move into it gain 2 Burn.
On Hit: Give 3 Burn.

name: fire skin potion
effect: Spend # and the potion; For 1 minute (6 turns) you cannot gain stacks of Burn, but light anything you touch on fire.

name: oil skin potion
effect: Spend # and the potion; For 1 minute (6 turns) you cannot gain stacks of Wet, have +2 when defending in Grapple contests, and when you gain stacks of Burn you gain +1 Burn.

name: stone skin potion
effect: Spend # and the potion; For 1 minute (6 turns) you reduce all damage taken by 1 (to a minimum of 1), and are immune to Knockback, but have -2 Speed.

name: feather weight potion
effect: Spend # and the potion; Once poured onto a Target or Consumed for 1 minute (6 turns) the target's weight is reduced by half and they gain +2 Speed, but they have -1 Dodge.

name: blurry bottle potion
effect: Spend # and the potion; For 1 minute (6 turns) gain +1 Dodge, but have -1 to all Attack sums.

name: blind rage potion
effect: Spend # and the potion; For 1 minute (6 turns) do an extra +2 damage on all Attacks, but have -1 to all Attack sums.

name: fragile precision potion
effect: Spend # and the potion; For 1 minute (6 turns) gain +2 on all Attack sums, but have -1 damage on all Attacks.

name: dragon's power potion
effect: Spend # and the potion; For 1 minute (6 turns) you Lock a 6 at the end of your turn. When this effect ends you cannot Lock dice for 1 minute (6 turns).

name: death's deal potion
effect: Spend # and the potion; You or a willing creature fully heal, but gain a stack of Death's Door.

name: soul stitch potion
effect: Spend # and the potion; You refund 3 Strain.

name: stat buff potion
effect: When created choose a Stat (Body, Mind, Soul, Arcana, Charm, Crafting, Medicine, Nature, or Thieving). Spend # and the potion; For 1 minute (6 turns) you have +1 on the chosen Stat. (This does not affect Max Health or Strain.)

name: fire breathing potion
effect: Spend # and the potion; For 1 minute (6 turns) you may Spend ## and gain 1 Burn to do a Spell Attack against up to 3 targets within 6 tiles of you. On Hit: Apply 3 Burn. On Miss: The target gains 1 Burn.

name: water breathing potion
effect: Spend # and the potion; For 1 hour you may breath water as if it was air.

name: potion of animal speech potion
effect: Spend # and the potion; For 1 hour you are able to have simple conversations with creatures that have the Animal Tag.

name: levitation potion
effect: Spend # and the potion; Once poured onto a Target or Consumed for 1 minute (6 turns) the target will move upwards 2 tiles at the end of their turn.

name: basic poison
effect: Spend # and the poison; Put the poison in food or apply to a weapon for 1 minute (6 turns). If put in food, when a creature eats the food, after 1 minute they take 6d4 damage. If applied to a weapon, if the weapon hits it deals an extra 1d4 damage.

name: armor rip poison
effect: Spend # and the poison; Apply to a weapon for 1 minute (6 turns). If the weapon hits, remove 3 Shielding then do other effects.

name: boiling blood poison
effect: Spend # and the poison; Apply to a weapon for 1 minute (6 turns). If the weapon hits, until the beginning of your next turn, the target gains 1 Burn when it takes damage from an Attack.

name: rockjoint poison
effect: Spend # and the poison; Apply to a weapon for 1 minute (6 turns). If the weapon hits, give the target Slow until the start of your next turn.

name: blightpetal poison
effect: Spend # and the poison; Apply to a weapon for 1 minute (6 turns). If the weapon hits, the target has -1 on all d12 rolls until the start of your next turn. (This does not stack.)

name: blinder poison
effect: Spend # and the poison; Apply to a weapon for 1 minute (6 turns). If the weapon hits, the target gains Blinded until the start of your next turn.

name: sleep poison
effect: Spend # and the poison; If the poison is consumed, whether in food or directly, the consumer falls asleep for 1 hour, until they take damage, or a creature spends ## to wake them.

name: truth serum
effect: Spend # and the poison; If the poison is consumed, whether in food or directly, the consumer cannot knowingly tell a lie for 1 hour.

name: wisp jar
description: A jar containing 3 floating pale rainbow wisps.
effect: Passively illuminates 2 tiles around it. Spend # and shake the jar to create 3 glowing floating wisps for up to 1 hour. Spend # to move the wisps up to 6 tiles. Each wisp cannot be more than 18 tiles away from the jar.

name: boots of waterwalking
description: A set of blue fish scale boots.
effect: While wearing the boots, the user can walk on water as if it were sandy land. The user can force their feet through the water in order to dive into it. Alternatively, they can put their feet on the surface while in the water to start to stand on it.

name: lightbolt pendant
description: A small yellow lightning bolt emblem on a simple leather cord.
effect: Spend # and break the pendant; For 1 minute gain 6 Speed.

name: basic art ring
effect: On creation pick any Art of level 3 or less. A creature wearing the ring may activate the Art without spending Strain up to 3 times per Break or Rest.

name: art imbuement stone
description: A small chalky pointed stone.
effect: At the end of a Rest a creature may spend the Stone and choose an Art they know to imbue an item with the chosen Art. Once per Rest, a creature may activate the Art without spending Strain.

name: soul gem
description: A purple quartz gemstone. If you listen closely you may be able to hear incomprehensible mumbling.
effect: Spend # to break the gem and get the benefits of taking a Break. Traits that give bonuses to others (such as *Field Repair* do not activate) and Art's durations do not end.

name: empty soul gem dagger
description: A clear quartz crystal, sharpened, placed on a brass handle.
effect:
On Hit: If the target is dead or lvl 4 or less Absorb their SOUL charging the Gem by their Level. If the target is lvl 5 or higher: Do 2 damage. 
Bonus: Gain +1d4 damage.
At 300 levels absorbed the Gem Becomes filled and you gain a Soul Gem.
upgrades: Silent - This weapon has +2 damage while you are Hidden.
Throwing - Double the Throw Range of this weapon.

name: mr cloud's prototype minigun
description: A quickly made minigun designed to rip the soul apart rather than the body.
effect:
This weapon requires ### to rev it before Attacks and stops being revved after an Attack. When revved do 2 Attacks per Attack action (same sum).
On Hit: The target spends 2d4 Strain.
Bonus: Stay revved.
tags: magical, weapon, two handed, range 18, body 2, mind 1

name: smoke mask
description: A solid obsidian mask that faintly emits smoke from the backside.
effect:
CURSED: When worn the mask Binds itself to the wearer. It cannot be removed willingly. When the wearer gains Wet they take 5 damage and if they are entirely submerged in a liquid they die (gain 3 stacks of Death's Door).
When worn the mask emits a thick black smoke enveloping the wearer. The wearer cannot gain stacks of Burn, gains +3 Ward on Rest, and their body becomes smoky allowing them to move through any space that their mask would fit through.

name: missing step boots
description: A pair of boots with no tread.
effect: While worn, the creature leaves no traces while stepping with the boots. **This does not prevent Arts like 'Track Creature' from detecting the wearer.**

name: pan of the divine chef
description: A seemingly normal pan. With the initial B on the handle.
effect: When this pan is held above a heat source, once per Rest, roll a d6. If the result is a 4 or higher an exquisite meal forms on the pan. Up to 6 creatures may eat the meal. If a 3 or less is rolled the same meal will appear but will be an Illusion.

name: decanter of sauces
description: A ceramic decanter with illustrations of sauce chefs on the side.
effect: The decanter has up to 6 charges and regains 1 charge every 3 hours. A creature may pour the decanter naming a sauce to pour up to one bowl of fresh sauce.

name: parachute ring
description: A silver ring with a cloud emblem pressed into it.
effect: Once a day, when the wearer falls 8 or more tiles the ring will cast 'Spectral Parachute' on the wearer.

name: jailers vase
description: An unusually sturdy pink glass vase with ornate visages of the things it contains.
effect:
When a creature looks through the mouth of the vase any willing target  they look at through the bottom of the vase will be absorbed and displayed on the side of the vase. *(Items are always willing)*
When a creature looks through the bottom of the vase the visage that faces up will be released into the world and removed from the side of the vase.
Targets absorbed by the vase do not progress through time and are "frozen" in whatever state they entered the vase. Creatures who are about 5ft tall (~1.5 m) are about 1 inch tall (~2.5 cm) tall on the vase.

name: ring of many wishes
description: A gold and blue ring with up to 5 black opals embedded in it.
effect: A creature can whisper into the ring a wish. The ring will then destroy one of its gems to change fate to grant the wish.
upgrades: CURSED - Roll a d6. On a 3 or less the **Opposite** of the wish happens.

name: winged cloak
description: A full cloak with embroidery of wings along the outside.
effect: When a creature wearing the cloak flares it open they are able to Fly. This effect lasts for up to an hour before needing to recharge over the course of a Rest.

name: magic candies
description: A small colorful bag containing various magic candies.
effect:
When found contains 2d6+3 magic candies. A creature may spend # (dice) to remove a candy from the bag. When they do roll a dice and gain one of the candies. A candy can be eaten with an additional # (dice).
*1: Shocking Sucker* - A small yellow and white sucker, which when eaten gives 1 additional speed for 1 minute.
*2: Gummy Dragon* - A randomly colored gummy dragon, which when eaten adds 1 to any dice you lock. This does not effect 6's and lasts for 1 minute.
*3: Balloon Gum* - A block of pink bubblegum, which when eaten lets you blow a massive bubble to slow your falling to 4 tiles a round, and not letting you take fall damage. The balloon lasts for 5 minutes or until popped.
*4: Back Breaker* - A heavy grey and blue jawbreaker, which when eaten gives you an extra dice when you try to push or lift something. This lasts for 10 minutes.
*5: Turtle Cookie* - A sugar cookie in the shape of a Turtle, which when eaten lets you hold your breath for an hour.
*6: Beetle Juice* - A little vial of purple liquid with the tag Beetle Juice on it. When drank gives you 5 Bonus Shielding which last until your next Rest.

name: living map
description: An ebony cloth map that shows glowing gold and white details.
effect: When the map is opened it shows a detailed map of the surrounding 3x3 medium tiles (108x108 normal tiles). The map shows the location of any creatures in its area. It wont show hidden areas or things disguised by magic such as Invisible creatures.
upgrades: True-sight Map - The map will show hidden areas and disguised magical areas.

name: boots of skipping
description: A set of leather boots with blue glowing runes inscribed on the outer heel.
effect: Up to 3 times per Rest the wearer can spend # (1 dice) and tap both heels together to activate the Art 'Soul Skip' without spending Strain.
upgrades: Farskip - Activate 'Far Skip' instead of 'Soul Skip'.

name: dragon egg pendant
description: A small silver dragon egg on a golden chain.
effect: Once per day, a creature can kiss the pendant to change any dice rolled into a 6.

name: ghost cloak
description: An almost fully transparent cloak with a blue and white tinge.
effect: Once a wearer becomes Hidden while wearing this cloak they become Bound to the cloak. While Bound the wearer can walk through non-metal walls as if it was Rough Terrain by spending 2 Strain per tile.

name: goggles of magic sight
description: A set of purple tinted Goggles with glowing runes on the outer bands.
effect: While wearing these goggles the user can spend ## (2 dice) to be able to sense magical effects within 6 tiles around them for up to 10 minutes. Objects and creatures that are affected by magic glow based on how powerful the magic is. The goggles can be activated once per Break.

name: owl eyes
description: A set of large round glasses with a rune on the nose guard.
effect: While wearing these glasses the user can see in poorly light areas as if they were illuminated. This effect does not work in complete darkness, such as in a cave system or in magical darkness.

name: orb of scrying
description: A smooth orb, with moving smoke floating within.
effect: The user places their hand on the orb and thinks of a place or person. The orb will activate the Art 'Farsight' at the location of the person or place. The distance from the place is still based on how well the user knows them. The user does not need to Focus on the Art and it lasts for the entire duration. The orb can be activated once per Rest.

name: ring of illusions
description: A ring carved with ever changing runes that seem to describe any number of lost secrets.
effect: The ring will binding to a user after they wear it for 1 hour. Once bound to a user, they can activate the Art 'Minor Illusion' at will, and 'Greater Illusion' once per Break without spending Strain.

name: ring of invisibility
description: A ring carved with completely clear runes that give the illusion of being holes in the ring.
effect: Once per Break, while being worn the wearer may spend # (1 dice) to cast Invisibility, without spending Strain.

name: sandles of speed
description: A set of leather sandals with golden inlay that looks like wind.
effect: While worn, the user has an additional 2 Speed.

name: scarf of the fish's tale
description: An ornate scarf decorated with a story of love lost at sea.
effect: The scarf will bind to a user when, while worn, the user gets stacks of Wet. Once bound to a user, while worn, they are able to breathe underwater and can “talk” to aquatic life.

name: sending skulls
description: A set of small skull earrings with a silver hook. Always found as a set of 2 or more.
effect: While worn, the wearer can hear anything said within 1 tile of any other paired sending skull. The skulls are paired when created and will become useless if only 1 is made or remains.

name: shield necklace
description: A silver necklace with a pendent in the shape of a shield.
effect: While worn the user gains +2 Ward at the end of a Rest.

name: slate of knowledge
description: A smooth flat plate of slate.
effect: The slate has a library of information stored within. All relating to a specific or general topic. When a question written in runic is scratched onto a face, if the Slate has knowledge about that topic, it will fill the rest of that face with knowledge written in runic about that topic. If it does not know information about that topic it will fill the face with random symbols. The face can be wiped clean to ask another question. A Slate cannot gain, or lose knowledge once created.

name: viper
description: A dagger with the head of a snake for the pommel and a line of green emerald going through its blade.
effect:
On Hit: Do 2 damage and make the target spend 2 Strain.
Bonus: Gain +1d4 damage and make the target spend that much more Strain.
upgrades: Silent - This weapon has +2 damage while you are Hidden.
Throwing - Double the Throw Range of this weapon.

name: wand of cubes
description: A long rectangular wand, made of some kind of unidentifiable stone.
effect: A user may activate the wand by pointing it in a direction and saying 'Cube'. Up to three times per Break the wand will activate the Art 'Cube' in the spot the user points to. The wand focuses on the spell, lasting the entire duration of the spell or until it is recast using this wand.

name: onyx blade
description: A sword which has been imbued with a dark curse turning its blade an Onyx black.
effect:
CURSED: Once a wielder deals damage with this weapon they become Bound to the blade. While Bound the owner has -1 Soul (This effects Max Health and Strain). They can only free themselves from this Binding by dying or breaking the blade.
On Hit: Do 3 damage. 
Bonus: If hit against a creature reduce the target's Soul by 1 until their next Rest. This effect does not stack, and does effect Max HP/Strain.
upgrades: Even Shorter - This weapon gains Side (counts as a Side Weapon)
Sharpened - +1 Damage

name: silverwolf greataxe
description: A greataxe with the blade resembling a howling silverwolf.
effect:
This greataxe has a bloodlust and will Bind itself to the wielder when they do damage. While Bound, whenever the bound creature damages an Animal or Monstrosity they do +2 damage.
 On Hit: Do 4 damage. Bonus: If you hit, remove 5 Shielding then do On Hit. Downside: -2 damage.
upgrades: Halberd - This weapon gains 2 Reaching but has -1 damage.

name: cane of the crowmaster
description: A short ebony cane with a silver crow head carved as the topper.
effect:
The wielder may spend ### (3 dice) to bind this item to themself and summon a Crow to the top of the cane. The Crow acts as a Follower and obeys your orders. You may only ever have 1 Crow from this staff. Alternatively, if you have a bird Follower you may instead summon the bird instead. The bird will also be bound to the cane if you do this.
You may spend # (1 dice) to teleport the Crow or follower bird to the top of the cane. When the Crow or follower bird dies you may gain 6 Strain to revive them. You may may do this for up to 10 minutes after they die, after which they are permanently dead and cannot be revived using this cane. (Crows can be re-summoned after 1 day without Strain cost).
On Hit: Do 2 damage. Bonus: If you hit, choose:  give 1 Burn, Wet until the end of their next turn, or do 1 damage to a new target within 1 tile of the main target.

name: bag of bartering
description: An empty messenger bag designed to look like a common shop.
effect:
When an item is placed into the bag, the item will disappear and the bag will fill with its equivalent worth of money as if it was sold to a shop.
When money is placed into the bag, it will disappear and a non-magical item of equivalent value will enter the bag. If you state the name of a non-magical item, the item named (or similar) will enter the bag instead.

name: bandana of the darkened skies
description: A dark grey bandana with silver threading.
effect: Wear the bandana at night time to bind to it. While bound to a user they may activate the Art 'Shadow Step' at will. Still spending Dice and Strain.

name: throwing cards
effect:
On Hit: Do 1 damage.
Bonus: Roll a d4 and gain the numbered bonus.
*1: Shells* - Refund 1 Strain.
*2: Trees* - Gain 2 Bonus Shielding.
*3: Gems* - +3 on the Attack Sum. (This does not effect Bonuses or Downsides)
*4: Spears* - +1d4 damage.
upgrades:
Expanded Deck - Roll a d6 instead of a d4 on Bonus. 
*5: Star* - Roll 2d4. Gain both Bonus effects. (Gain 4 Bonus Shielding if you roll two 2's).
*6: Dragon* - Lock a 6.

name: book of the radiant constellations
description: A book with a blue crystal spine and black pages. Every page depicts a different constellation: Archer, Dragon, Goblet, Lamp, Tree, and the Turtle.
effect:
A creature can spend # (1 dice) to rip a page out of the book activating the respective constellations Art without spending Strain. The creature still must Focus on Arts that require it. Once a page is removed it cannot be added back to the book. 
- *Archer:* 'Starfall'
- *Dragon:* 'Dragon Form'
- *Goblet:* 'Wave'
- *Lamp:* 'Elemental Burst'
- *Tree:* 'Healing Bloom'
- *Turtle:* 'Fortify'

name: crystal of grandeur
description: A clear diamond monocle with silver and gold handles.
effect: While looking through the lens items of value will begin to give a golden glow. The more valuable the item is the brighter the glow. The glow will pass through up to 1 tile worth of non-metal walls or floors.

name: deepforge hammer
description: A hammer with a pitch black steel head and a diamond for the pommel.
effect:
This weapon has a thirst for metal. When this weapon does damage to Shielding it absorbs some of the material gaining a stack of scrap. Using this hammer a creature may activate the Art 'Replicate' by spending scrap instead of money.

This Weapon does double damage against objects and structures.
On Hit: Do 2 damage. 
Bonus: If you hit, you may do 2 Knockback.
upgrades: Proven - Bonus: Do +2 damage instead of Knockback.
Delayed - Knockback accumulates from this weapon and happens at the end of your Turn.

name: drake ring
description: A small Ouroboros drake ring with Emerald gems for eyes.
effect: Once per Break or Rest, a creature may activate the Art 'Awaken Item' without spending Strain on the ring by rubbing the head of the drake. This can be done 1 handed and while worn. The drake has Claws ('Dagger'), a 2 in Thieving, and can Climb. The drake can carry up to a pound (~0.5 kg), or push/drag up to 2 pounds (~1 kg).
upgrades: Refined Body - The Drake gains +1 in all Stats, its carry weight, and push/drag weight.

name: everlasting flask
description: A perpetually half full flask with gold vines wrapping around the outer shell and a series of runes etched around the lip.
effect:
When the flask is poured it will spend a charge to produce a dosage worth of liquid. The amount a dosage is depends on liquid. For instance if wine is poured out the flask will give 1 cup worth of liquid, while if you have a poison only a small amount will come out. You can pour in a new liquid to change what liquid the flask contains and depending on the rarity of the liquid determines how many charges the flask has. 

- Mundane (water, beer, etc) has infinite charges per Rest.
- Common (oil, milk, etc) have 5 charges per Rest.
- Un-common (honey, expensive wine, etc.) have 3 charges per Rest.
- Rare has 1 charge per Rest.
- This item can't re-create Legendary liquids.

name: glutton's fork
description: A fork with iridescent metal head and a wooden handle.
effect: Three times per Rest a creature may spend # (1 dice) to stab the fork into any non-organic material. Whatever the fork was stabbed into becomes edible. Consumed items heal and refund Strain to the user equal to the items rarity. Common items heal and refund 1 Strain. Uncommon: 2, Rare: 4, and Legendary: 8. Magical items grant double the heal and Strain refunded.

name: hat of dimensions
description: A nondescript hat with an extremely dense set of runes on the inner tag.
effect: When put on the wearer will be transported to a different dimension, determined when the hat was made. The wearer will stay in this dimension until they take the hat off, at which point they will return to their original dimension.

name: immovable rod
description: A silver rod with a button on either end of it.
effect: A user may spend # (1 dice) to press either button. When either button is pressed the rod magically freezes in place, becoming immovable even in the air. Either button can be pressed again to undo this effect.

name: marksman's arcane eye
description: A stone eye, with a pupil of blue and gold runes.
effect: Once inserted into the users head the eye binds itself to the user. While you have a creature Marked you are able to see a glowing outline of them, even through walls. You are always able to see the target marked this way, even if they are Hidden or Obscured.

name: overconfidence
description: A set of heavy platemail which gives its wearer an unusual sense of confidence while worn.
effect:
The armor will bind itself to a creature once they get into a situation with more enemies than allies. Once bound to a user, while worn, if the wearer is above half health (rounded up), they Heal 1 at the beginning of their turn (every 6 seconds). While they are below half health (rounded up), they take 1 damage at the beginning of their turn instead. This effect ends once the bound creature gains a stack of Death's Door.

At the end of a Rest gain 4xBODY + 3xMIND + LEVEL Shielding. While worn gives -1 Speed and Dodge.
upgrades: Paladin - 4xBODY + 2xSOUL + LEVEL Shielding on Rest instead of default.

name: rocket maul
description: A pointed maul with an orange and red crystal embedded within its head. Metal piping can be seen forcing explosive force from the crystal to the back of the maul.
effect:
The wielder can spend # (1 dice) and 1 Strain to activate the explosive crystal. Your next Weapon Attack you do with this weapon, does an an additional 6 damage, but counts as an attack sum of 4 or less, regardless of dice given.

This Weapon does double damage against objects and structures.
On Hit: Do 4 damage.
Bonus: If you hit, you may do 4 Knockback.
Downside: You gain Slow until the start of your next turn.

name: undying heart
description: A heart that continues to beat even when its body is lost.
effect:
The heart can be consumed to permanently increases Max Health by 5.
Found in a 'dead' Lich. This is needed to craft a potion of Life.

name: tome of the all knowing
description: A book with a wooden face for a front cover and pages written in ever changing runes.
effect:
When held the mask will awaken and will state the following: 'I am the Tome of the All Knowing. I can answer almost any question. I have the power to answer (number of charges) questions. Ask.' 

After which it will sit there waiting for a question to be spoken aloud. The first question spoken aloud within 6 tiles of the held book will be answered if possible. The book will then lose 1 charge and say the above line again. The book starts with 1d6 worth of charges. Once all charges have been spent the book will go to sleep. For every year the book is asleep it will regain 1 charge.

name: phoenix feather
description: A golden glimmering orange feather that is warm to the touch.
effect:
If a creature dies while in possession of the feather the feather turns to dust, the creature's Health is set to 1, and they lose all stacks of Death's Door and Exhaustion.
This is needed to craft a potion of Life.

name: potion of life
description: The potion looks like a vibrant slew of purples, oranges, and reds all dancing around a single point in the center.
effect:
Pour this over a dead creature. If the creature is not cursed as an Undead, they are revived. The creature's Soul must be free and the creature cannot have been dead for more than 1 month.
In order to craft you must combine a Phoenix Feather, Undying Heart, and Holy Water.

name: skipping ammo
description: A special ammo with a spell rune carved onto its side.
effect: When fired from a ranged weapon the shot will teleport to the target. This shot cannot be Dodged or multi-targeted (such as from the art 'Redirect'). This shot will ignore creatures, objects, or walls that are in the way. However, you must still be able to Attack the target normally to hit them.

name: spellshot ammo
description: A special ammo with a spell rune carved onto its side.
effect:
When found or made pick an Art that costs 4 or less.
When fired from a ranged weapon apply the effect of the carved Art to the target. If the Art has no target (such as an area Art) the target is the center of the Art.

name: tracker's watch
description: A wristwatch with only a single arrowhead on its face.
effect: A creature can bind to the watch by wearing it for 24 hours. Once bound a creature can spend # (1 dice) to tap its face to activate the Art 'Find Object' or 'Track Creature' without spending Strain or excess time. When the chosen target is within 8 tiles of the watch, they gain Marked for 10 minutes.

name: runeshot pistol
description: A pistol with 3 barrels. Gold runes adorn the outside of each barrel.
effect:
On Hit: Do 2 damage.
Bonus: Spend 2 Strain to leave a trail of sparking runes along the path of the shot. This trail lasts until the beginning of your next turn. If a creature walks within 1 tile of this path they take 1 damage and are knocked back 1 tile. Multiple paths can be placed on the same line, stacking this effect.
Downside: Your hand slips, doing 2 less damage to Shielding.

name: red-spark ball bat
description: A red Ball Bat with a black handle and an orange gem on its head.
effect:
The bat will bind to a user when they launch something with the bat. Once Bound the creature may spend ## and 1 Strain to create a spectral ball and do a Ranged Attack with the bat.

Double your Throw Range while wielding this weapon.
On Hit: Do 4 damage.
Bonus: If you hit, give the target Slow until the start of your next turn.
upgrades: Spiked - Bonus: If you hit, the target takes 1 damage every dice they spend on their next turn.
Metal Core - +1 Damage

name: cap of everywhere
description: A gray newsboy cap with a jet black interior.
effect:
The cap will bind to the first wearer who travels throughout an entire city or teleports 1 medium tile in total.
Once Bound, the owner may spend # (1 dice) to throw the cap. When it lands the bound creature is teleported to wherever the cap landed springing up so that the cap is being worn. The cap can be called back to the owner by spending # (1 dice) teleporting it to the owners head.
upgrades: The cap is sentient and will Bind itself to the first host that puts it on. The sentience living in the hat will try to make the user steal random objects. When an object is unguarded the cap will try to force its owner to steal it, the owner must do a Mind contest against the cap (it has a Mind of 2). On failure, the owner must take and keep the item. The cap has an unusual affinity for candles and will try extra hard to make the user take them (roll with a Mind of 4 for this contest).

name: dawn
description: A mace with a head made of a pure golden crystal. The crystal shines continuously as if it was a piece of the sun.
effect:
This weapon has 10 Max Strain. The wielder may activate the Arts 'Spear of Light or Dark', '(Tempname) Mage Spot', 'Branding Smite', or 'Dawn or Dusk' by spending their normal dice and the weapon's Strain. The wielder still Focuses on the Art if needed. The weapon refunds 1 Strain for every hour it is within natural sunlight.

This Weapon gives 2 extra Burn to Prone targets. 
On Hit: Give the target 2 Burn and Glow until the start of your next turn. 
Bonus: If the target is Rooted they become Prone.

You need a 'God Shard' to craft this item.
upgrades: Knockdown - Bonus: If the target is Stunned they become Prone.
Glowy - This weapon gains Glow. (Can be used to cast spells)

name: holy hand grenade
description: A round golden ball with various gemstones adorning it.
effect:
Spend ##; Throw the grenade to a point up to 6 tiles away. Do a Thrown Attack against everything within 4 tiles of that point. 
On Hit: Do 12 damage. If the target is a Monstrosity, Planar, or Undead do an additional 12 damage.
Bonus: If the target is a Monstrosity, Planar, or Undead they cannot Dodge this Attack.

name: philosopher's stone
description: A small red/pink stone that numbs the touch.
effect: A creature may activate the Art 'Equivalent Exchange' without spending strain.

name: thorny chainmail
description: A set of seemingly poorly made chainmail, which cuts those that touch it for too long.
effect:
While Grappling or when being Grappled do 2 damage to the other creature at the beginning of your turn.
At the end of a Rest gain 2xBODY + 2xMIND + LEVEL Shielding. While worn gives -1 Speed.
upgrades: Quick Release - When you have no Shielding gain +1 Speed.

name: potion of the ages
description: The potion looks like a red wine, with an almost grainy texture to it.
effect:
When ingested, roll a d12. You de-age an amount of years equal to this roll.

In order to craft you must combine blood from a dragon, a pure diamond, white sand, and 'Holy Water'.

name: ashbender pipe
description: A pipe that creates an unusual amount of smoke.
effect: When a creature blows smoke from this pipe they may control the smokes shape for 1 minute. This pipe can make up to 1 tile of smoke at a time.
upgrades: Expanded Power - The wielder may control any smoke within 3 tiles of them.

name: waterlight candle
description: A blue hued candle.
effect: This candle can't be put out by liquids.

name: simple prosthetic body-part
effect: A semi-magical replacement for a missing body-part.
upgrades: Art Etched - Imbue an Art into the part that the wearer can Activate once per Rest.

name: crown of the little friends
description: A tiara with a green rune etched into it.
effect: While worn, the wearer is able to have simple conversations with small creatures that have the Animal Tag.
upgrades: Royal - The wearer may spend ### to summon an un-alligned small Animal. (They are not a Follower.)

name: enchanting instrument
effect: The wielder may spend ## (2 dice) to do a Charm contest against a creature that can hear them. If they win, the target is Charmed for 1 minute.

name: charlatans coin
description: An unusually shiny coin.
effect: The coin will Bind to the first creature that flips it. When Bound the owner may spend # to teleport the coin to their hand.
upgrades: Valuable - The coin is worth more. (This upgrade can stack.)

name: re-arranging lock
description: A lock with an unusual keyhole
effect: When a creature tries to pick this lock they have -1d4 on Thieving rolls.

name: banana of the darkened skies
description: Its just a slightly overripe banana. Nothing magical about it. Nope nope nope.
effect: When consumed the banana activates the Art 'Dawn or Dusk' choosing Dusk.

name: bonebreaker knuckles
description: A pair of steel knuckles with leather padding.
effect:
When this weapon does damage it does 1 additional damage this turn. This effect stacks.

On Hit: Do 1+BODY damage. Bonus: If you or the target are Grappled, gain +2 damage.
upgrades: Spiked - +1 Damage

name: harpoon
effect:
On Hit: Do 3 damage.
Bonus: Do a Body contest against the target. If you win, pull the target 6 tiles towards you. If you lose, pull 3 tiles instead.
Downside: Do not Autoload at the end of your turn.
upgrades: Chain Launcher - Gain +1d4 on the Body contest to pull.

name: shellbreaker axe
description: A special type of axe designed to hunt Dragon Turtles near the northern wastes.
effect:
On Hit: Remove 3 Shielding then do 2 damage.
Bonus: If you hit, remove 3 Shielding then do On Hit.
Downside: -1 Damage.

name: silver sword
effect:
If the target is a Monstrosity, Planar, or Undead do an extra 1d4+1 damage.
On Hit: Do 3 damage.
Bonus: Gain +2 damage.
upgrades: Short - This weapon gains Side (counts as a Side Weapon)
Sharpened - +1 Damage

name: giant-feller greatsword
effect:
This weapon does +1d4 damage against Large creatures. 

On Hit: Do 4 damage.
Bonus: Gain +2 damage.
Downside: -2 damage.

name: mythic slayer greataxe
description: A greataxe with etchings of multiple mythic creatures being slayed by an axe.
effect:
This weapon does double damage against Mythical creatures.

On Hit: Do 4 damage.
Bonus: If you hit, remove 5 Shielding then do On Hit.
Downside: -2 damage.
upgrades: Halberd - This weapon gains 2 Reaching but has -1 damage.

name: sparkmaster rapier
description: A slightly jagged rapier witch seems to spark when in contact with other metal.
effect:
This weapon binds to a user once they touch this weapon to another source of metal. Once bound to a user, they may activate the Arts 'Short Circuit', 'Chain Lightning', and 'Volatile Steps' (choosing Wind) once per Rest without spending Strain.

On Hit: Do 2 damage.
Bonus: You may move 3 tiles before or after the Attack.
upgrades: Light - Bonus: +1 tile to move
Gilded - Damage becomes CHARM-1

name: naturewound bow
description: Seemingly living branches wound into a short-bow.
effect:
The wielder may activate the Art 'Nature's Tools' at will.

On Hit: Do 2 damage.
Bonus: If you hit, give the target Slow until the start of your next turn.
upgrades: Composite - +1 damage, +3 range
Seriated Arrows - On Hit: Do 1 damage at the start of the hit target's next turn. (This effect stacks.)

name: livingwood armor
description: Light armor made from the bark and roots of an Ironwood bush.
effect:
While worn, the wearer can not lose Shielding from 1 damage or less.

At the end of a Rest gain your LEVEL Shielding. While worn gives +1 Dodge.
upgrades: Custom Made - Choose a Sub-Stat. Gain +SUB-STAT Shielding.

name: holy water
description: Water blessed with a divine power.
effect:
When in contact with a Monstrosity, Planar, or Undead they take 1d4 damage at the start of their turn and can't heal.

Spend ##; Throw the water to a point up to 6 tiles away. Everything within 2 tiles of that point gains Wet.
Spend # and the water; Apply to a weapon for 1 minute (6 turns). If the weapon hits, give Wet until the start of your next turn.
